name: Just One Use
description:
*Game made for BRJAM

This is a tower defense game where your towers only last for one wave of enemies, after which they break.

You control a character who, with his crystals, buys his turrets from the shopkeeper and physically positions them, carrying the turret, going to the desired location and installing.

Controls:

W A S D or Arrow Keys  =  Movement

E  =  Open Shop

Mouse Left Click  =  Buy Turret  and  Extract Crystal

Mouse Right Click  =  Place Turret

Space  =  Skip to the Enemy Wave
